column4: hello, I'm wondering if there are any folders in Ubuntu that you can store shit in that you can hide
I have 2 porn files I don't want my dad to see, he's not very smart when it comes to computers
Where is a safe non threatening place in My Computer to store files
I'll pretend you didn't mention what it was.  Just begin the folder with a . and it will be hidden.  .myStuff
It's just in appropriate for the channel
